title: TV Cable Hide
summary: Tuck TV cords with surface raceways for a cleaner living room.

fitCheck.question: Are cords visible below the TV?
Do you want a no-drill cable cover?
Is the wall smooth enough for adhesive?

items.name: Adhesive cable raceway
items.why: Hides cables in a clean channel.

removalNotes: Touch up wall with mild cleaner
steps: Unplug devices and plan the cable path.
Clean the wall where the raceway will attach.
Mount the raceway and bundle cords inside.
Mount the power strip and plug devices back in.
mistakes: Mounting the raceway over textured walls.
Leaving slack that hangs outside the channel.

faqs.a: Choose a paintable kit and follow the instructions.
